thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com
thread.title: Margaret
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Margaret

author: Margaret
title: Margaret
text: I had a great experience at home zone more than one sales clerk ask me if we needed help or if we had any questions . I have kids day tgey kept them busy with ice cream and a video while we looked around at the furniture. One particular clerk named Sergio was really awesome , qualifying me for credit was easy ! I would recommend home zone for your next purchase of home furnishings! I'm one happy customer!
